00066 template<typename UIntType, size_t w, size_t s, size_t r>
00067   class subtract_with_carry_engine
00068 {
00071   private:
00072     static const UIntType modulus = UIntType(1) << w;
00076   public:
00077     // types
00078     
00082     typedef UIntType result_type;
00083 
00084     // engine characteristics
00085 
00088     static const size_t word_size = w;
00089 
00092     static const size_t short_lag = s;
00093 
00096     static const size_t long_lag = r;
00097 
00100     static const result_type min = 0;
00101 
00104     static const result_type max = modulus - 1;
00105 
00108     static const result_type default_seed = 19780503u;
00109 
00110     // constructors and seeding functions
00111 
00117     __host__ __device__
00118     explicit subtract_with_carry_engine(result_type value = default_seed);
00119 
00125     __host__ __device__
00126     void seed(result_type value = default_seed);
00127 
00128     // generating functions
00129     
00133     __host__ __device__
00134     result_type operator()(void);
00135 
00142     __host__ __device__
00143     void discard(unsigned long long z);
00144 
00147   private:
00148     result_type m_x[long_lag];
00149     unsigned int m_k;
00150     int m_carry;
00151 
00152     friend struct thrust::random::detail::random_core_access;
00153 
00154     __host__ __device__
00155     bool equal(const subtract_with_carry_engine &rhs) const;
00156 
00157     template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
00158     std::basic_ostream<CharT,Traits>& stream_out(std::basic_ostream<CharT,Traits> &os) const;
00159 
00160     template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
00161     std::basic_istream<CharT,Traits>& stream_in(std::basic_istream<CharT,Traits> &is);
00162 
00165 }; // end subtract_with_carry_engine
